General Information: Phone:
1-888-327-8486 eMail: info@earthtones.com Wireless Customer Service & Support: Phone: 1-888-327-8486 eMail: info@earthtones.com Internet Technical Support: Phone :
1-877-301-0650 eMail : 24hoursupport@earthtones.com Long Distance Customer Service: Phone: 1-800-466-1550 eMail : longdistance@earthtones.com

Join our mailing list to receive Green Alerts by e-mail each month! Click on 
    this button to sign up:
Earth Tones Residential Long Distance Service

Residential Long Distance Competitively priced, high quality service. Help save the Earth every time you dial the 
phone! The differences between us and any other 
long distance service are that 100% of the profits from your Earth Tones phone 
bill go to support non-profit environmental organizations and through our 
monthly Green Alerts we make it easy for you to get involved in protecting the 
environment. Choose from our three great calling plans: Green Saver Plan : 
  $4.95/month, and $0.07/minute for all state-to-state calls Our most popular calling 
  plan is the Green Saver Plan, this plan is best for people who make more than 
  two and a half hours of long distance calls a month. Discount international 
  rates are included for no extra charge.* In-state rates vary. [Click here for 
  in-state rates.] Sign up Now! Blue Defender 
  Plan : $2.00 monthly fee and $0.08/minute for all state-to-state calls This calling plan is best 
  for people who use between one and two and a half hours of long distance a 
  month. Discount international rates are 
  included for no extra charge.* In-state rates vary. [Click here for 
  in-state rates.] Sign up Now! Sustainer Plan : 
  NO monthly fee and $0.13/minute for 
  all state-to-state calls This plan is best for 
  people who use very little long distance an hour or less a month   and who do 
  not frequently call internationally. In-state 
  rates vary. [Click here for in-state rates] . Sign up Now! * Please click here for rates to particular 
countries under the Green Saver and Blue Defender plans. International rates are 
good 24 hours a day 7 days a week. International calls are billed in full minute 
increments. ** We offer electronic billing and automatic 
payment options for no addition cost. Paper bills on double-sided, 100% 
  recycled paper are also available for $1.99 monthly fee.
